alert.note: Alert for Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:31PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wallowa County through 500 PM PDT... At 430 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Imnaha, or 30 miles northeast of Enterprise, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wallowa County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
